productDescription: The gray version of our signature bucket hat. Made from a cotton blend and great to wear for the summer. Handmade with love in our studio in Utrecht, the Netherlands.

optionalInfo.care: Hand wash in cold water no soap, Do not tumble dry, dry flat.
optionalInfo.production: Our products are hand made with love in our atelier in Utrecht, The Netherlands
